short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus on code snippets of a page, add copy button to a code snippet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TL Snippets is a useful Chrome extension that can be a game-changer for developers and programmers who frequently use online code repositories.

With TL Snippets, a copy button is added next to every code snippet on a website, making it easier to copy code without any hassle. The copy button saves time and effort, especially when the code is lengthy or complicated, as it eliminates the need for users to manually highlight and copy the code themselves.

Moreover, TL Snippets also allows users to view all code snippets present on a webpage without any distractions. The extension retrieves all code snippets and shows them in a popup window, making it convenient for users to navigate through them. With this feature, users can quickly find the relevant code they need and copy it with ease.
